config.configDesc: (אתה חייב ללחוץ על 'Save & Restart' כדי שחלק מהשינויים יקרו)
config.extremeGamesDesc: Allows Extreme tag filters to be toggled, created and modified to control content unsuitable for children.
config.hideExtremeScreenshotsDesc: Hides screenshots of Extreme tagged content, can be unhidden with a click on the image box.
config.fancyAnimationsDesc: Enable fancy animations in the launcher.
config.searchLimitDesc: Limit the number of results returned in any search
config.enableEditingDesc: אפשר עריכת משחקים ותוכנות נוספות. גם מראה כרטיסיות הקשורות לעריכה.
config.symlinkCurationDesc: Uses symbolic links to test curations rather than copying files. Faster and supports MAD4FP. Admin rights required.
config.onDemandImagesDesc: הורד ושמור סמלילים חסרים וצילומי מסך במידת הצורך.
config.onDemandImagesEnabledDesc: Enable downloading of on-demand logos and screenshots.
config.onDemandImagesCompressedDesc: Downloads compressed images instead, saving ~80% disk space. (Does not delete existing images)
config.playtimeTrackingDesc: Options based around tracking game playtime. (Not used in analytics)
config.enablePlaytimeTrackingDesc: Allow tracking last played date, total playtime and play count for games.
config.enablePlaytimeTrackingExtremeDesc: Allow tracking last played date, total playtime and play count for Extreme games.
config.enableTagFilterIndexDesc: Enable use of the Tag Filter Index to speed up lots of queries
config.enableVerboseLoggingDesc: Enables verbose logging for external libraries.
config.clearPlaytimeTrackingDesc: Clears last played, total playtime and play count for every game. Irreversible.
config.fallbackLanguageDesc: באיזו שפה להשתמש במקום שפה נוכחית לא גמורה.
config.randomLibrariesDesc: ספריות לשימוש בבחירות אקראיות בעמוד הבית.
config.nativePlatformsDesc: השתמש בגירסאות מקומיות של פלטפורמות אלה. (אם לא זמין הוא ישתמש ב-Wine)
config.tagFilterGroupsDesc: These groups will filter suggestions and games out of search results
config.appPathOverridesDesc: Overrides the application path on the left with the one on the right when launching games.
config.useCustomTitleBarDesc: השתמש בפס כותרת מותאם אישית בחלק העליון של חלון זה.
config.themeDesc: מזהה של מראה התוכנה שתרצו להשתמש.
config.screenshotPreviewModeDesc: Preview the screenshot of a Game in Grid mode
config.screenshotPreviewDelayDesc: Delay (in milliseconds) before showing the screenshot, when Screenshot Preview is set to on. (when hovering)
config.optimizeDatabaseDesc: Run maintenance tasks to increase database performance and reduce size
config.showDeveloperTabDesc: הצג את כרטיסיית המפתחים. סביר להניח שזה מועיל רק למפתחים ומארכנים.
config.registerProtocolDesc: Registers the launcher to respond to 'flashpoint://' protocol requests.
config.serverDesc: Which Server to run when playing games.
config.curateServerDesc: Which Server to run when running curations.
config.metadataServerHostDesc: מארח של שרת המטא-נתונים. משומש בשביל לסנכרן מידע חדש ומעודכן לגבי משחקים למשגר.
config.noExtensionsLoaded: הרחבות אינן טעונות, התקן אותן ל '{0}'

home.hallOfFameInfo: רוצה רק את הטובים ביותר? בדקו את {0}!
home.notes: Don't forget to read the help page or manual if you're having issues.

app.softwareUpdateRequired: Software updated required. Do this now?
app.noLauncherUpdateReady: Metadata update requires a newer Launcher version, but the software update is not currently available.

developer.developerDesc: פה נמצאים כל הכלים היעילים למפתחים.
developer.checkMissingImagesDesc: הצג את כל המשחקים בלי תמונות
developer.checkGameIdsDesc: הצג משחקים עם מספרי זהות כפולים או שגויים
developer.checkGameTitlesDesc: הצג משחקים עם שמות כפולים על אותה טכנולוגיה
developer.checkGameFieldsDesc: List all games with empty fields (of the fields that should not be empty)
developer.checkPlaylistsDesc: List all playlists with duplicate or invalid IDs, or that has game entries with missing, invalid or duplicate IDs
developer.checkGameFileLocationDesc: List all games with launch commands that can not be parsed into file paths (this is related to the 'Open File Location' function, not launching the game)
developer.checkMissingExecMappingsDesc: List all unique execs for win32, linux and darwin which are missing an exec mapping
developer.renameImagesTitleToIdDesc: Find all game images with the games title in their filename and rename them to use its ID instead
developer.renameImagesIdToTitleDesc: Find all game images with the games ID in their filename and rename them to use its title instead
developer.createMissingFoldersDesc: Find all missing folders in the Flashpoint folder structure and create them
developer.importLegacyPlatformsDesc: Imports Legacy Platforms from `Data/Platforms/` - WARNING: Will overwrite conflicting games
developer.updateTagsStringDesc: Updates all tagged fields on all games (e.g Tags, Platforms)
developer.fixPrimaryAliasesDesc: Add a primary alias to any tags that are missing one
developer.fixCommaTagsDesc: Splits tags with commas into many tags and applies them to all applicable games
developer.exportTagsDesc: Creates a file full of tags and tag categories that can be used by 'Import Tags'
developer.exportDatabaseDesc: Creates a file full of tags and tag categories that can be used by live metadata servers
developer.importTagsDesc: Imports Tags from an file created by 'Export Tags'
developer.migrateExtremeGamesDesc: Removes 'Extreme' from any games and assigns the 'LEGACY-Extreme' tag to them
developer.massImportGameDataDesc: Mass imports Game Data packs, attempting to match their filename to a games UUID.
developer.detailsDesc: פתח דיאלוג עם מידע על השירות

about.flashpointDesc: The preservation project this launcher was built for, a non-profit with the goal of furthering archival and accessibility efforts of games, animations and other digital interactive experiences on the web.
about.flashpointLauncherDesc: An open-source desktop application used to browse, manage and play games from the Flashpoint Archive.
about.licenseInfo: MIT (Read the file named 'LICENSE' for more information)

browse.dropImageHere: Drop an image here to add it
browse.clickToSelectGame: Click on a game to select it.
browse.dropGameOnLeft: Drop a game on this playlist in the {0} to add it.
browse.setFlashpointPathQuestion: Have you set the path to the {0} at the {1} page?
browse.noteSaveAndRestart: Note: You have to press {0} for the change to take effect.
browse.noGameMatchedDesc: No game title matched your search.
browse.noGameMatchedSearch: Try searching for something less restrictive.

tags.name: Name
tags.makeAliasWhenMerged: Make this an alias of the tag?

curate.importAllDesc: Import all curations that are currently loaded
curate.deleteAllDesc: Delete all curations that are currently loaded
curate.openCurationsFolderDesc: Open the Curations folder in explorer
curate.openExportsFolderDesc: Open the default Exports folder containing your exported curations.
curate.openImportedFolderDesc: Open the default Imported curations folder containing your imported curations.
curate.newCurationDesc: Creates a new curation with a unique folder
curate.loadMetaDesc: Load one or more Curation meta files
curate.loadArchiveDesc: Load one or more Curation archives
curate.loadFolderDesc: Load one or more Curation folders
curate.scanNewCurationFoldersDesc: Scans for curations that have been added after the initial scan
curate.heading: Heading
curate.deleteCurationDesc: Delete this curation (Files can not be recovered)
curate.noPlatforms: At least 1 'Platform' is requried on every curation.
curate.invalidLaunchCommand: 'Launch Command' does not fit these URL requirements:
curate.releaseDateInvalid: 'Release Date' must follow YYYY-MM-DD (month and day are optional).
curate.unusedApplicationPath: 'Application Path' has an unused value. Make sure it's spelled correctly!
curate.unusedTags: The following tags are not present on any other game. Are they correct?
curate.unusedPlatform: 'Platform' has an unused value. Make sure it's spelled correctly!
curate.nonExistingLibrary: 'Library' is not the name of an existing library! (Default will be used)
curate.nonContentFolders: Non-Content folders found in Curation folder. Are they supposed to be there?
curate.noTags: There are no tags on this curation.
curate.unenteredTag: The Tags text field hasn't been submitted.
curate.noLogo: There is no logo on this curation.
curate.noScreenshot: There is no screenshot on this curation.
curate.ilc_nonExistant: Point to an existing file in your curation's 'content' folder.
curate.documentStatus: Notes must document changes and missing content for Hacked / Partial games

playlist.saveDesc: Save changes made and stop editing
playlist.discardDesc: Discard changes made and stop editing

misc.deleteAllBlankImages: מחק את כל ה{0} תמונות למשחק זה

dialog.phpNotFound:
PHP אינו נמצא בנתיב. האם הוא מותקן?
ייתכן שתיתקלו בהתנהגות לא מצופה ואף שבורה בלעדיו.
dialog.wineNotFound:
Wine אינו מותקן, אבל נדרש על מנת להריץ משחק זה.
אנא ראו את המאמר תמיכה בלינוקס בויקיפדיה(של פלאשפוינט) בשביל פרטים נוספים.
dialog.flashpointPathNotFound: תיקית הפלאשפוינט אינה נקבעה או שגויה. האם אתם רוצים לבחור תיקיה להתקין אליה עכשיו?
dialog.importedPlaylistAlreadyExists: קיימת רשימת הפעלה מיובאת עם אותו השם - '{0}'
dialog.exportedAlreadyExistsYesNo:
One or more of the exported files already exists.
 Do you want to replace them?
dialog.selectFileToExportPlaylist: Select file to save the Playlist to
dialog.dataRequiredDesc:
You must install the Upgrade on the home screen before being able to use the launcher.

Do you wish to do this now?
dialog.verifyPathSelection: Future upgrades will also install here. Is this correct?
dialog.restartToApplyUpgrade:
העדכון הזה לא ייושם עד להפעלה מחדש.
האם אתם רוצים לעשות זאת עכשיו?
dialog.areYouSureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
dialog.areYouSurePlaylistRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this entry from the playlist?
dialog.uploadPrivacyWarning:
This will make your Logs available publicly.
A link will be copied to your clipboard.

Are you sure?
dialog.overwriteFileMessage: קובץ עם אותו השם כבר קיים. האם ברצונך להחליפו?
dialog.nukeTagFilterGroup:
Nuke this tag filter group?
All games with these tags will be deleted and unrecoverable.
This may take a long time.
dialog.removePlaylistGame: Remove this Game from the Playlist?
dialog.deleteGame: Delete this Game? This cannot be undone.
dialog.deleteGameData: Delete this Game Data? This cannot be undone.
dialog.unableToUninstallGameData: Unable to delete data pack. Is it in use? Try restarting the launcher.
dialog.unableToDeleteGame: Unable to delete game. Is it in use? Try restarting the launcher.
dialog.aFewMinutes: This may take a few minutes.
dialog.importCurationWithWarnings: Import this curation? There are still warnings present.
dialog.errorImportingCuration: Error import curation '{0}', check logs page for details.
dialog.exportCurationWithWarnings: Export Curation even though it has Warnings?
dialog.requiresAdditionalDownload:
You are missing the {0} support pack, which is required to launch this entry.
Download now?
dialog.requiresAdditionalDownloadPlural:
You are missing {0} support packs which are required to launch this entry.
Download now?
dialog.confirmClearPlaytime: Clear all game playtime and play history data? This is irreversible.

upgrades.infinityDesc: דרושים קבצים. מוסיפים תמיכה למשחקי פלאש.
upgrades.techDesc: מוסיף תמיכה לכל שאר הפלטפורמות - שוקוויב, יוניטי, ג'אווה, HTML5 ועוד...
upgrades.screenshotsDesc: מוסיף סמלים למצב ראיית הטבלה וצילומי מסך לכל המשחקים.
